document.full_text: canadian patent licensing company wi-lan inc said it signed a new patent licensing deal with cisco systems inc, which will give the top network equipment maker a multi-year license to all of wi-lan's patent portfolio.
document.title: cisco, wi-lan sign patent license agreement
lines_and_colors: canadian patent licensing company wi-lan inc said it signed a new patent licensing deal with cisco systems inc, which will give the top network equipment maker a multi-year license to all of wi-lan's patent portfolio.
